channel-type.label: Command
channel-type.description: Sends a command to a device

channel-type.label: Raw Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Sets fan speed using raw Bond values

channel-type.label: Mean Breeze Speed
channel-type.description: Sets the average speed in breeze mode. 0 = minimum average speed (calm), 100 = maximum average speed (storm)

channel-type.label: Breeze Variability
channel-type.description: Sets the variability of the speed in breeze mode. 0 = minimum variation (steady), 100 = maximum variation (gusty)

channel-type.label: Fan Direction
channel-type.description: Sets the fan direction; forward or reverse. The forward and reverse modes are sometimes called Summer and Winter

channel-type.label: Timer
channel-type.description: Starts a timer for s seconds. If power if off, device is implicitly turned on

channel-type.label: Light
channel-type.description: Turns the light on the ceiling fan on or off

channel-type.label: Enable Up or Down Light
channel-type.description: Enables or disables the up or down light of the ceiling fan. The light must also be on to turn on the up light.

channel-type.label: Flame Level
channel-type.description: Turns on or adjust the flame level

channel-type.label: Fireplace Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Adjusts the speed of the fireplace fan

channel-type.label: Shade
channel-type.description: Opens, closes, or stops motorized shades
